items.content_html: Vue Typing is a lightweight directive compatible with both Vue 2 and Vue 3. It simulates the typing of text for any HTML tag, providing a dynamic typing effect. It's perfect for creating typing animations in your Vue.js applications.

items.content_html: My Chrome Extension is a lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension that displays ongoing cricket matches using data fetched from an API. This extension dynamically updates the match information and presents it in a colorful, interactive interface.
